import React from 'react' import './checkout-item.styles.scss' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { removeItem } from '../../redux/cart/cartactions' const CheckoutItem = ({item}) => { const {imageUrl, name, quantity, price } = item return(
{name} {quantity} {price}
✖
) } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ removeItem : item => dispatch(removeItem(item)) }) export default CheckoutItem
